title: Mikansei Na Bokutachi

Only, he didnâ€™t look like the type to have written something so serious. 5) Yonjyuukyuu no Eien â€œUera-kun, youâ€™re not running any more?â€ Those were the last words she thought sheâ€™d say to the boy she loved, who died that afternoon saving a girl from being hit by a carâ€“until his ghost appeared.
